data: Fog of the colour known as pea-soup—in reality amber mixed with lemon-peel and delicately tinted with smut—pervaded the genial shades of Kensington Gardens and cast a halo of breathless romance over many a “long, unlovely street” and many a towering pile of crudely hideous flats in the regions round about.
